attributes.action: Retain sensible last collection times from Royal Mail boxes.
attributes.additional_details:
Royal Mail has announced revised collection times from 50,000 boxes throughout the UK. In many instances these times are ridiculous - 9am Mon-Fri and 7am Sat seem commonplace.

We are told that there will always be a box with half a mile. That's a one mile walk - not clever if you are elderly or disabled, especially in bad weather.

This comes from Moya Greene who has a salary of £1.35 million and fails to understand that this will further reduce the letters carried by Royal Mail.

The petition calls upon the government to censure Moya Greene.
